branchCategory.name: LEFS Electric Actuator, Slider Type, Ball Screw Drive
branchCategory.description: The original LEFS slider features an inline motor with a cover. Because the motor drives the ballscrew directly, additional cost of a belt and pulley system is avoided. The motor cover is taller than the load platform, so be aware of potential interference at the origin position.
branchCategory.bullets: <UL> <LI>Body sizes: 16, 25, 32, 40 <LI>Maximum work load: 60 kg <LI>Maximum speed: 1200 mm/s (H lead, step motor, size 25 or larger) <LI>Stroke range: 50 to 1000 mm in 50 mm increments <LI>Positioning repeatability: ±0.02 mm <LI>Motor types: high load step motor or high speed servo motor </LI></UL>

breadCrumb.name: LEFS Electric Actuator, Slider Type, Ball Screw Drive
